reviewText: Where can I order the english version region 1 of And Never Let Her Go

Although the movie was long, I couldn't tear myself away - not even to eat dinner!  Mark Harmon was very believable in the lead role. The story was intriguing, but sad.  If this were a book, it would be "a real page turner".

I received this DVD from the seller and it wouldn't play on my DVD player because of "area limitations". The address on the outside of the package was pretty illegible so I couldn't return it or get in touch. I'm one of Ann Rule's biggest admirers and was looking forward to seeing the movie.
